title: Xylography before Typography, 1423 and after
description: [MOCK DATA - description invented for prototype] Woodblock printing (xylography) predates movable type printing. Cabinet has content about this topic in the Paper and Printing unit.
primarySource: Cabinet reference - details not fully scraped
